c: p:yahari ore no seishun love come wa machigatteiru
d:
Decided to make a gallery of his work since the only other gallery is FANBOX only. Especially since their Twitter has apparently been scrubbed of some of their older works.

He can be found at the following locations:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/shou937
FANBOX: https://www.fanbox.cc/@shou3719
Pixiv: https://t.co/ykvJ1xGVTE

Current organization method:
Old -> New

Yukino -> Iroha -> Yui -> Komachi -> Misc. Oregairu -> Oregairu Theme Sets -> Random Twitter/One-Offs -> Series Sets -> FANBOX
The "Random Twitter" section is roughly grouped if there are about ~2 pics from a series. No guarantees.

If you would like the WIP images removed, lemme know and put your "vote" in. I would suggest against it though as some works are only available in WIP form.

2023/12/28: Merry Belated Christmas. New organization method implemented, see above "Current organization method:" header.
New Twitter images added.
Some WIP items have left WIP-Hell and have been nuked.
Duplicates have been nuked.
New FANBOX images added. FANBOX now starts at 385.
12/28 Mini-Update: Expect a re-up sometime soon. Will be replacing several of the Twitter images with the more high-quality Pixiv copies as some of them are pretty gnarly.
12/31 Mini-Update: Torrent up. I will be seeding for the next two days then intermittently afterwards.

2024/03/09: Happy belated New Years/Chinese New Years/Ground Hog Day/Valentines. Have snipped some older update messages to save space.
Some items have left WIP-hell and have been nuked.
Have replaced some Twitter images with their higher-res Pixiv versions.
New Yukino, Iroha, Yui, Komachi, and other Oregairu images added.
New Twitter images added.
New Series Sets images added.
New FANBOX added. FANBOX now starts at 408
